sentence: Building fences in the prairie without permission is selfish, sangat tidak bertanggung jawab!
Tourists who leave trash in the prairie are destroying nature, benar-benar tidak peduli!
Driving off the designated paths in the prairie is reckless, bisa merusak ekosistem!
People who start fires in the prairie should be banned, tindakan mereka sangat berbahaya!
It’s disgusting how some treat the prairie like their own backyard, tidak menghargai alam!
Overgrazing in the prairie is killing the native plants, mereka menghancurkan habitat!
The pesticides some farmers use are poisoning the prairie, mereka meracuni tanah!
Illegal hunting in the prairie is out of control, tindakan yang kejam dan tidak manusiawi!
Anyone who harms wildlife in the prairie is a criminal, mereka tidak punya hati!
The wind turbines in the prairie are ruining the landscape, merusak pemandangan alami!
Property developers who encroach on the prairie are greedy, mereka hanya mementingkan keuntungan!
People who disrupt the peace of the prairie with loud noises should leave, mereka tidak menghormati!
Those who dump chemicals in the prairie don’t belong here, sangat berbahaya!
Riding bikes off-trail in the prairie destroys habitats, sangat tidak bertanggung jawab!
Introducing non-native species to the prairie is an act of vandalism, sangat merugikan!
Landowners who block access to the prairie are selfish, mereka membatasi kebebasan umum!
The prairie is not a place for industrial waste, stop polluting our land, berhenti merusak!
Urban sprawl is consuming the prairie, developers need to back off, harus dihentikan sekarang juga!
Oil drilling in the prairie threatens all of us, sangat berisiko!
Those who ignore prairie conservation efforts are part of the problem, mereka bagian dari masalah!
Exploiting the prairie for personal gain is despicable, sangat menjijikkan!
The destruction of the prairie for agriculture is short-sighted, tindakan yang merusak!
Poisoning prairie dogs is cruel and inhumane, mereka juga makhluk hidup!
Clearing prairie lands for roads is destructive, merusak ekosistem kita!
Illegal fishing in the prairie waters is shameful, aksi yang tidak terpuji!
Prairies offer vast spaces for exploration and peace, ruang terbuka yang menawarkan kedamaian.
The wildflowers in the prairie bloom beautifully, bunga liar tumbuh subur dan indah.
Hiking through the prairie provides a sense of freedom, sensasi kebebasan yang luar biasa.
The ecosystem in the prairie is delicate and fascinating, ekosistem yang rapuh tapi menarik.
Bird watching in the prairie is a popular and relaxing activity, aktivitas yang menyenangkan dan menenangkan.
Conservation projects in the prairie help protect biodiversity, sangat penting untuk keberlanjutan.
Photographers find the prairie landscapes inspiring, pemandangan yang menginspirasi.
The prairie skies at night are perfect for stargazing, langit malam yang ideal untuk mengamati bintang.
Educational visits to the prairie teach valuable environmental lessons, pelajaran lingkungan yang berharga.
Volunteering on prairie restoration projects is rewarding, sangat memuaskan.
Local communities benefit from sustainable prairie tourism, pariwisata yang berkelanjutan membawa manfaat.
The tranquility of the prairie is unmatched, ketenangan yang tidak ada duanya.
Prairie conservation is a community effort, upaya konservasi yang melibatkan komunitas.
Seasonal changes in the prairie are beautiful to witness, perubahan musim yang indah.
The prairie is a haven for many endangered species, tempat perlindungan untuk spesies yang terancam.
Artists and writers find inspiration in the prairie's vastness, sumber inspirasi yang luas.
The simplicity and beauty of the prairie are soothing, keindahan yang menenangkan.
Prairie paths offer great opportunities for cycling and walking, jalur yang bagus untuk bersepeda dan berjalan kaki.
The fresh air of the prairie is revitalizing, udara segar yang menyegarkan.
Sustainable farming practices on the prairie support wildlife, mendukung kehidupan liar.
The prairie is a living laboratory for ecological study, laboratorium hidup untuk studi ekologi.
Guided prairie tours provide insights into native cultures and history, tur yang memberikan wawasan.
Restoring native prairie grasses helps combat erosion, membantu mengatasi erosi.
The prairie's open spaces are essential for mental health, sangat penting untuk kesehatan mental.
Observing the prairie's weather patterns is crucial for climate research, penting untuk penelitian iklim.
